title: Quick question! Match history lookup+
body: Im looking for the ability to look up all matches myself and another player have played together. I have googled my butt off and just cant seem to find a website that has the ability to put in 2 different summoner names and they would bring up our match history together. Does anyone have a tip or trick or maybe im just missing the website? thanks guys!

replies.body:
Hmmm....I'm not aware of any 3rd party website that does this to be honest.  It sounds fairly interesting, but I wonder how much of a demand there is for something like this as it sounds fairly niche.

I wish I had a better answer, but I wanted to at least post in here and confirm there is no direct way from a Riot source :(

OK. I do know there is a pretty good demand. at least for my group of friends and friend list. Also this is a great way to find out what my stats are like with my duo supports. (I main adc and have a list of supports that I play with)
something I could review with them and find where our faults are. now that there is a replay system we can at least commentate our selfs. But this would be a great add on! any chance i can get any more news on what this could turn into? would you be bringing it to a board meeting of other godly nerds who mod my favorite game?

can i use a custom skin if it only changes the look no more
{{summoner:2}}
